column2:
#Changing data format so that I can calculate the values I need from the posterior distribution
clean_data <- total_posts %>% 
  select(region, position, gender, .draw, .epred) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  select(-.row) %>% 
  pivot_wider(id_cols=c( region, position, .draw),
              names_from=gender,
              values_from=.epred) %>% 
  pivot_wider(id_cols=c( region, .draw),
              names_from=position,
              values_from=c("female", "male", "unknown")) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=-c(.draw,  region ),
               names_to="pos_gend",
               values_to="value") %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  group_by(region) %>% 
  pivot_wider(id_cols=c(.draw,  region), 
              names_from=pos_gend,
              values_from=value) %>% 
  mutate(diff_tt=male_tt-female_tt) %>% 
  mutate(diff_ins=male_instructor-female_instructor)
